macro.name: BAUD
macro.description: Serial communication baud rate, defaults to 9600.

macro.name: BITS
macro.description: Serial communication number of bits, defaults to 8.

macro.name: PARITY
macro.description: Serial communication parity, defaults to none.

macro.name: STOP
macro.description: Serial communication stop bit, defaults to 2.

macro.name: ADDRESS
macro.description: Internal address of the unit, defaults to 1.

macro.name: PARKPOS
macro.description: Whether the chopper should park open (1) or closed (0).

macro.name: PARKCLOSED
macro.description: Angle at which to park if PARKPOS = 0.

macro.name: PARKOPEN
macro.description: Angle at which to park if PARKPOS = 1.
